message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a great product and I think it would be perfect for you. I'm offering it to you for $180. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest! While $120 is a good starting point, I'm looking to get closer to $150 to make this work. Would you be willing to come up a bit?
I understand where you're coming from, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $150. How about we meet in the middle at $135? Can you consider that?
